Type the word you are learning
It is recommended to Modify or Delete
The permissions for camera and storage are necessary for the correct functioning of the App
“Hola Salo” is an App for vocabulary learning, through video and picture association. By matching a visual guide from a familiar perspective with simple pictures and words

1. Create a new element to learn
 2. Look through created elements
 3. Recently added elements
 4. A side menu
 5. App's tutorial
When creating a new element, you match it with:

A word which can be an object or an action

 A video that represents the word or shows the person who is teaching

 A picture (optional if the video shows the person)
When uploading a video, you can capture it from camera or add a previously recorded video from the device
The picture can be captured from camera, downloaded from the web or uploaded from the device storage.\n\n If no picture is added, you can save without one
To be able to capture pictures and videos or accessing them from storage these permissions are necessary, if they are not allowed the App won’t work properly
In the Library menu you can find all the elements that have been created so far and in the home screen you will see most recent two
When clicking on any element you\'ll see these items:

1. An associated picture, if there is one
 2. Play the video
 3. Congratulations on learning a word
 4. Change the video or picture
 5. Delete from the library
When playing the video, you will see it like this

As on the left, a person saying the word and a picture that represents it

 Or as on the right, a video that shows the word, without a picture

 In any case you must listen to a voice saying the word to learn
The side menu on the home screen provides options for capturing videos and pictures, or downloading images from the web for later use in creating words
And the help Icon takes you to the tutorial you just went through
¡It\'s time to start Creating and Learning!
